pages.text: $(o)Arcanus is a magic mod about learning and casting various spells. $(br2)To get started, you need to find a Spell Book, usually in Village Libraries. Picking up the Spellbook will teach you the spell, and the left/right click combo to cast it.

pages.title: GETTING STARTED
pages.text: $(o)Progressing in Spectrum relies on using both the manual called Colorful World, as well as Advancements, which you can access by pressing L. You'll also need a wand to cast spells!
